pullRequest.title: [BEAM-9276] Create a class to encapsulate the steps required to submit a pipeline
pullRequest.bodyText:
PortableRunner.run_pipeline is a fairly monolithic method for submitting a pipeline.  This PR factors out the code responsible for interacting with the job and artifact services and breaks the process down into smaller methods to make the code more reusable (prepare, stage, run).  The primary immediate impact is greater code reuse across tests:  we can now modify certain steps in tests while preserving and testing the core submission code without the need to copy-paste submission code into each test.  In the future it could make it easier for ProtableRunner subclasses to customize the interactions with the job and artifact services.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.
